Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.TUI

Class TUIView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.TUI.TUIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatListener, LocalModelListener, StationListener, TableListener, TurnStateListener, GameHandlingListener, PlayerCreationListener, Listener, SetupListener, StateListener, GeneralListener, UI
public class TUIView extends Object implements UI, GeneralListener
The class manages the Textual User Interface (TUI) of the game.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    (package private) static enum 
    TUIView.ShowState
    Enumeration defining what the user is currently seeing: - NOT_PLAYING, the user sees the logo, the available colors and more
    private static final record 
    TUIView.StationInfos
    Represents information related to a station, given the personal station of the player and a list of all the stations of the game.

      Returns:
      The chosen connection type.

    • runTUI

      private void runTUI()
      Runs the TUI of the game. Manages connection to the server, user input, and command parsing.

    • printTUIView

      public void printTUIView(String[][] TUIView)
      This method prints to terminal a matrix of strings, each string represents two UTF-8 wide character(s), Making all lines aligned. Make sure to use monospace supported fonts, line Noto Sans Mono + Noto Color Emoji
      Parameters:
      TUIView - the matrix of strings to print

    • textTUIView

      String[] textTUIView(String text)
      Splits a string into an array of strings, each representing a character so that it is ensured an alignment when text is printed to the terminal.
      Parameters:
      text - , the input string to split and printed.
      Returns:
      tne array of strings representing characters of the input text to be printed.

    • tableTUIView

      String[][] tableTUIView(PlayableCard resource1, PlayableCard resource2, PlayableCard gold1, PlayableCard gold2, Symbol resourceDeckSeed, Symbol goldDeckSeed)
      Generates a textual representation of the game table LocalTable for the TUI.
      Parameters:
      resource1 - the first resource card on the table.
      resource2 - the second resource card on the table.
      gold1 - the first gold card on the table.
      gold2 - the second gold card on the table.
      resourceDeckSeed - the seed of the resource deck.
      goldDeckSeed - the seed of the gold deck.
      Returns:
      a matrix of strings representing the game table in the TUI.

    • emptyCardTUIView

      private String[][] emptyCardTUIView()
      Generates an empty card matrix for the TUI.
      Returns:
      A matrix of strings representing an empty card.

    • visibleSymbolsTUIView

      private String[][] visibleSymbolsTUIView(Map<Symbol,Integer> visibleSymbols)
      Generates a textual representation of the map of visible symbols to display in the TUI.
      Parameters:
      visibleSymbols - a map containing visible symbols in a station and their counts.
      Returns:
      a matrix of strings representing the visible symbols.

    • goalEffectView

      public String[][] goalEffectView(SymbolEffect symbolEffect)
      Generates a textual representation of the effect of a GoalCard with its symbol effect for display in the user interface. The symbol effect consist of having a required number of symbols that give points to the player.
      Parameters:
      symbolEffect - the symbol effect that will be printed in the TUI
      Returns:
      A matrix of strings representing the symbol effect to be printed.

      Parameters:
      requiredSymbol - the map containing the Symbols and the number of times they are visible in the station.
      Returns:
      A matrix of strings representing the required symbols to be printed.

    • notify

      public void notify(GameHandlingEvents type, List<String> varArgs)
      To notify the view that a Game was created or joined
      Specified by:
      notify in interface GameHandlingListener
      Parameters:
      type - the type of GameHandlingEvents that was received. CREATED_GAME, if the game was created. JOINED_GAMES, if a game was joined. AVAILABLE_GAMES, if the list of available games is updated.
      varArgs - is a list of available information (on the game or on the available games).

      Parameters:

      private void printOtherStation()

    • printHelper

      private void printHelper()
      To print the helper of the game. The helper shows the commands that can be sent to the game.

    • printHelper

      private void printHelper(ViewState viewState)
      To print the helper of a specific state of the game. This helper will print just the actions that the client can actually use in a phase of the game.

    • printCommonPlayingActions

      private void printCommonPlayingActions()
      To print common commands in all TUI states
